desc: In this volume collected articles presented at Uttaradit Rajabhat University International Conference on Science and Technology 2016 (URDU ICST 2016, August 1-2, 2016, Uttaradit, Thailand). The main topics of issue are: technologies in the food processing and pharmacology, technologies for production of renewable energy, advanced materials and chemical technologies, computational algorithms and procedures, signal and data processing. Presented articles will be useful for scientists, engineers and students whose activities is related with research in the specified areas of engineering sciences.
title: Uru International Conference on Science and Technology 2016 (Applied Mechanics and Materials)
